events.message: I received my new headphones today, but unfortunately, one of the earpieces is broken and not working at all.
The issue was identified as a product defect because the customer reported broken earpieces upon delivery.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in product defects.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us a photo of the damaged earpiece and confirm if the packaging was intact when you received it?
I have attached pictures showing the broken earpiece. The box seemed fine but the damage was definitely inside.
Thank you for the photos. We can send you a replacement pair immediately or offer a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement pair as soon as possible, thanks for the quick response.
We have arranged for a replacement pair to be shipped out today with expedited delivery at no extra cost.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement headphones arrived and are working well for you.
The replacement arrived yesterday, and everything is perfect now. Very happy with your support.
Glad to hear that you are satisfied with the replacement. We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
